name: Schema for numberReturned

sources.title: OGC API Features - Part 1 - Core corrigendum

abstract: The number of features in the feature collection
description:
A server may omit this information in a response, if the information
about the number of features is not known or difficult to compute.

If the value is provided, the value shall be identical to the number
of items in the "features" array.
annotatedSchema:
description: 'The number of features in the feature collection.


  A server may omit this information in a response, if the information

  about the number of features is not known or difficult to compute.


  If the value is provided, the value shall be identical to the number

  of items in the "features" array.'
type: integer
minimum: 0
example: 10
